long_description: The Hugger Mugger Round Yoga Bolster combines just the right amount of inner strength and stability with a comfy, soft surface that will take you through many years of practice. Cotton cover filled with foam core and cotton batting. Exceptional firmness helps you maintain structural integrity in all poses. Upholstery-grade fabric is durable and long lasting. Hugger Mugger Round Yoga Bolster has convenient handles on both ends.
short_description: The Hugger Mugger Round Yoga Bolster combines just the right amount of inner strength and stability with a comfy, soft surface that will take you through many years of practice.
